Posts.Content: ameer00 wrote: Hi , my mother was diagnosed with breast cancer she had surgery last week that removed part of breast  and the surgeon removed suspicious tissue from another part the pathological report is as follow : speicimen 1 : breast canncer with safety margins specimen 2 : suspicious mass high grade infiltrating duct carcinoma free all margins free all detected 23 axilliary LNs specimen 2: focal infiltration of simmilar tumor tissue pathological TNM .pT1 ,pN0 , Mx stage I at least so what can that tell as other than the tumor is bad type and itsn't removed completly ? please help  Log in to post a reply
